pages.scene_desc: Cover with child as Little Red Riding Hood
pages.image_prompt_template: Cover portrait, red hood, basket, friendly forest; full‑bleed; title '{title}' visible.

pages.text: One day, {child_name} packed a cozy basket for Grandma.
pages.image_prompt_template: Warm kitchen interior; mother handing basket.

pages.text: Birdsong and sunshine guided each careful step.
pages.image_prompt_template: Forest path, dappled light; child humming.

pages.text: A curious wolf asked a riddle—no one was afraid.
A helpful shop offered clever tools for the journey.
Grandma smiled—plans were already in motion.
{child_name} answered tricks with wit and kindness.
The wolf blinked and padded away, quite confused.
Grandma's door glowed like a sunrise.
Inside, everything felt safe and bright.
pages.image_prompt_template: Entry interior; basket and tools by door.

pages.text: A friendly spritz and a giggle solved the mix-up.
Prepared and kind—that was {child_name}'s happy ending.
pages.image_prompt_template: Grandma and child hug; warm backlight.
